alert.note: Alert for Denali (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 02 at 9:53AM AKST until January 03 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST MONDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow occurring. Plan on areas of significantly reduced visibilities to one half mile or less at times. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph will cause areas of significant blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Parks Highway south of the Denali Park Entrance. * WHEN...Until 6 AM Monday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of blowing and drifting snow will create difficult travel conditions at times. Cold wind chills as low as 50 below zero will cause frostbite in as little as 10 minutes to exposed skin. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for blowing snow means periods of blowing snow will cause travel difficulties. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
